dai::DAIAlg

dai::DAIAlg< GRM > Class Template Reference

#include <dai/daialg.h>

Inheritance diagram for dai::DAIAlg< GRM >:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class GRM>
class dai::DAIAlg< GRM >

Combines an InfAlg and a graphical model, e.g., a FactorGraph or RegionGraph.

Template Parameters:
GRM Should be castable to FactorGraph

Member Function Documentation

virtual void dai::InfAlg::init (  )  [pure virtual, inherited]

Initializes all data structures of the approximate inference algorithm.

This method should be called at least once before run() is called

Implemented in dai::BP, dai::ExactInf, dai::HAK, dai::JTree, dai::LC, dai::MF, dai::MR, and dai::TreeEP.

virtual void dai::InfAlg::init ( const VarSet &  ns  )  [pure virtual, inherited]

Initializes all data structures corresponding to some set of variables.

This method can be used to do a partial initialization after a part of the factor graph has changed. Instead of initializing all data structures, it only initializes those involving the variables in ns.

Implemented in dai::BP, dai::ExactInf, dai::HAK, dai::JTree, dai::LC, dai::MF, dai::MR, and dai::TreeEP.

virtual double dai::InfAlg::maxDiff (  )  const [pure virtual, inherited]

Return maximum difference between single node beliefs in the last pass

Exceptions:
Exception if not implemented/supported

Implemented in dai::BP, dai::ExactInf, dai::HAK, dai::JTree, dai::LC, dai::MF, dai::MR, and dai::TreeEP.

virtual size_t dai::InfAlg::Iterations (  )  const [pure virtual, inherited]

Return number of passes over the factorgraph

Exceptions:
Exception if not implemented/supported

Implemented in dai::BP, dai::ExactInf, dai::HAK, dai::JTree, dai::LC, dai::MF, dai::MR, and dai::TreeEP.
